examples.korean: They discussed the problems ailing the steel industry. 발음듣기 그들은 철강업을 힘들게 만드는 문제들을 논의했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They discussed the problems ailing the steel industry. 발음

examples.korean: She works herself too hard. 발음듣기 그녀는 일을 너무 열심히[힘들게] 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She works herself too hard. 발음

examples.korean: After a hard day’s work, it’s nice to get home and put your feet up. 발음듣기 하루 동안 힘들게 일한 후에 집에 돌아와 앉아 쉬면 참 좋다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: After a hard day’s work, it’s nice to get home and put your feet up. 발음

examples.korean: They’re making life hot for her. 발음듣기 그들이 그녀를 살기 힘들게 만들고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They’re making life hot for her. 발음

examples.korean: She seems bent on making life difficult for me. 발음듣기 그녀가 나를 살기 힘들게 하려고 작정을 한 모양이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She seems bent on making life difficult for me. 발음
